name: Ditto X4 Looper
details: Two Channel LooperDITTO X4 LOOPER is the pedal that’ll let you turn a single moment in time into something truly spectacular. By perfectly merging ease of use with stellar creative features like dual loop tracks, 7 loop FX, loop decay and MIDI sync, DITTO X4 LOOPER will instantly become the canvas on which you paint your multi-layered sonic masterpieces. If you can dream it, you can loop it!
